review: Excellent product!  It found my WI-FI easily and connection was a snap.  Since it was already registered to my Amazon Prime account, my movie/ TV show list was immediately available.  Adding apps like Netflix, Showtime and others were without issue as my Internet and TV service is currently UVerse.  So far this device has provided me with several hours of viewing in any location that I choose.
